answers.answer: It sounds to me like the beginning stages of menopause.
Diabetes can also cause frequent urination. Are you also thirsty a lot? It would be a good idea for you to get your blood sugar tested.

Well I have the same problem and I have been tested for diabetes and I was told I was neg on that test... But I did have a hysterectomy and this has been a ongoing problem since..I am thirsty a lot too.. so I am lost on this one..

question: I have been going to the restroom today about 16 times or more to urinate.  I'm 60 and in good help, or I think I am.  What could be the cause?This discussion is related to/posts/show/533783.
title: going to restroom way too much
